metadata.Title: CVE-2021-41868 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
OnionShare 2.3 before 2.4 allows remote unauthenticated attackers to upload files on a non-public node when using the --receive functionality.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-41868` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

onionshare - 2.6-1
onionshare-cli - 2.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: onionshare package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6-1').
